product_name: CamelBak Pit Boss Hydration Snow Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Pit Boss(TM) hydration snow pack is designed for skiers who long for fresh, untracked lines, so don't limit your skiing to crowded, lift-served slopes! CamelBak Pit Boss carries skis diagonally or A-frame or a snowboard vertically or horizontally; external pocket stows a shovel. Drop-out probe pocket provides fast access to your probe in the event of an emergency; goggles pocket keeps your eyewear ready to shred. Specially designed zipper offers access to gear without having to remove your skis or board; zipper also opens pack along the side to provide wide-open access to contents. Main compartment holds backcountry must-haves as well as the small extras that keep you comfortable all day. Internal pockets organize backcountry cargo; pack easily carries probe, avalanche assessment equipment and other essentials. Padded waistbelt with convenience pocket supports a heavy load; harness optimizes fit and stability while you ski. The CamelBak Pit Boss hydration ski pack features a helmet carry loop that makes it easy to stash your helmet while hiking. Therminator(TM) harness features a pocket that's meant to store a hand warmer and prevent tube freeze-up; harness makes it easy to get to your mouthpiece. Camelbak has improved zipper placement to ease loading up the reservoir and to encourage frequent sipping. Improved reservoir features a lightweight fill port, a low-proflie design and a cap that opens and closes easily. HydroGuard(TM) technology inhibits bacterial growth on reservoir and tube surfaces (but does not protect user from disease organisms; please wash reservoir after each use). Delivery tube and bite valve run through the right shoulder strap to protect from freezing. Big Bite(TM) valve features a handy on/off switch.
